verbose_text: As the activation of these receptors results in the synthesis of proangiogenic factors, such as vascular endothelial growth factor (VEGF) and basic fibroblast growth factor (bFGF), which activate proangiogenic cascades [extracellular signal related kinases / mitogen activated protein kinases (MAPK) cascade] promoting angiogenesis 25.
